DOC.brief_summary: In cross-sectional study investigator examine two population : young adult ( age 18-35 ) old adult ( age 65 ) diabetes > 2 insulin injection per day . The sample size observational study 125 patient . The investigator issue Common Sensing GoCap bluetooth-enabled pen cap fit end Solostar Lantus Apidra insulin pen ; pen cap register position insulin pen plunger automatically send confirmation dose delivery smartphone app .
DOC.brief_title: Insulin Dosing Practices Persons With Diabetes Multiple Daily Injections
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes insulinrequiring Type 2 diabetes > 2 insulin injection Age 1835 old 65 year Use glargine insulin basal insulin Stable insulin dos past 3 month Previous tape/adhesive allergy CGM sensor Visual cognitive impairment inability selfadminister insulin
